document.description: A list of park and ride lot locations around the state of ... Park and ride is the way to go. Leave your car in a well maintained lot, catch a bus, carpool or vanpool is ...

Home Statewide Options Accessible Travel Carpools / Vanpools Flexible Schedules Park and Ride Lots Travel by Air Travel by Bus Travel by Ferry Work from Home
Questions?
In most cases park and ride lots are operated and maintained by local transit agencies. For questions regarding a specific park and ride lot, please contact the transit agencies that serves it.
King County Metro 206-553-3000 Sound Transit 888-889-6368 Pierce Transit 800-562-8109 Community Transit 800-562-1375 Intercity Transit 800-287-6348 Spokane Transit 509-328-7433
For agencies not listed here, please refer to the website links in the locator to the right or use the regional services provider in the state map below. Â Click an area of the map for commute and travel options.
